pipeline: Simplified Bypass Pipeline with CAPE Validation

signatures.name: queries_computer_name
signatures.description: Queries computer hostname

signatures.name: queries_user_name
signatures.description: Queries the username

signatures.name: dead_connect
signatures.description: Attempts to connect to a dead IP:Port (1 unique times)

signatures.name: queries_keyboard_layout
signatures.description: Queries the keyboard layout

signatures.name: queries_locale_api
signatures.description: Queries the computer locale (possible geofencing)

signatures.name: static_pe_pdbpath
signatures.description: The PE file contains a PDB path

signatures.name: antidebug_setunhandledexceptionfilter
signatures.description: SetUnhandledExceptionFilter detected (possible anti-debug)

signatures.name: stealth_timeout
signatures.description: Possible date expiration check, exits too soon after checking local time

signatures.name: language_check_registry
signatures.description: Checks system language via registry key (possible geofencing)

signatures.name: http_request
signatures.description: Performs HTTP requests potentially not found in PCAP.

signatures.name: creates_suspended_process
signatures.description: Creates a process in a suspended state, likely for injection

signatures.name: resumethread_remote_process
signatures.description: Resumed a thread in another process

data.thread_resumed: Process svchost.exe with process ID 776 resumed a thread in another process with the process ID 8532
Process rovwer.exe with process ID 8200 resumed a thread in another process with the process ID 9068

signatures.name: stealth_window
signatures.description: A process created a hidden window

signatures.name: terminates_remote_process
signatures.description: Terminates another process

signatures.name: packer_entropy
signatures.description: The binary likely contains encrypted or compressed data

signatures.name: injection_rwx
signatures.description: Creates RWX memory

signatures.name: uses_windows_utilities
signatures.description: Uses Windows utilities for basic functionality

signatures.name: uses_windows_utilities_to_create_scheduled_task
signatures.description: Uses Windows utilities to create a scheduled task

signatures.name: antisandbox_sleep
signatures.description: A process attempted to delay the analysis task by a long amount of time.

data.note: rovwer.exe tried to sleep 3876.0 seconds, actually delayed analysis time by 0.0 seconds

signatures.name: infostealer_cookies
signatures.description: Touches a file containing cookies, possibly for information gathering

signatures.name: persistence_autorun
signatures.description: Installs itself for autorun at Windows startup

signatures.description: Installs itself for autorun at Windows startup

signatures.name: recon_beacon
signatures.description: A process sent information about the computer to a remote location.

signatures.description: Yara detections observed in process dumps, payloads or dropped files
